column2: ##H0 = The data is consistent with a specified reference distribution.
##H1 = The data is NOT consistent with a specified reference distribution.
VG.q <- qvg(p, vgC=c, sigma=sigma, theta=theta, nu=nu)
chisq.test(l_ret.s, VG.q) #(se il pvalue Ã¨ grande, accettiamo ip.nulla. ip.nulla=VG 'fitta' bene i dati)
as.numeric(l_ret) and rvg(length(as.numeric(l_ret)), param = c(c, sigma, theta, nu))
#H0 = Two samples are drown from a population with same distribution.
as.numeric(l_ret) and rnorm(length(as.numeric(l_ret)), mean = mean(l_ret.s), sd = sd(l_ret.s))
